channel.title: Gerben A. Van Kleef on Terence Dores Cruz - PhD Candidate
channel.description: Recent content in Gerben A. Van Kleef on Terence Dores Cruz - PhD Candidate

item.title: Getting a Grip on the Grapevine: Extension and Factor Structure of the Motives to Gossip Questionnaire
item.description: The Motives to Gossip Questionnaire was extended with an emotion venting scale. The five factor structure was supported and fully invariant across gossip definitions.
